patthana15.62:1.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:1.1_1: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:1.1_2: Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:2.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:2.1_1: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:2.1_2: Upekkhāsahagataṁ akusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
